page.title: 08The Old Railway Line
page.content:
The old railway line,that goes through Tonge, was part of the main line from Derby to Ashby-de-la-Zouch, built by the Midland Railway.
The Derby-Melbourne line opened 1st September 1868 The Melbourne-Worthington line opened 1st October 1869 The Worthington-Ashby line opened 1st January 1874.
The line was about 10 miles long. Between Derby and Ashby were Peartree,Chelleston,Melbourne,Tonge and Worthington Stations. Up to 7 goods trains ran per day.
